body: If you have a taste for software quality, are curious about technology, and are looking for more ways to contribute to a project, consider becoming an automated tester. There’s a new role for testers out there. One that blends the art of traditional testing, with analysis, development, and automation. It’s also very exciting and needed by every Agile team.The QA teams inside 1&1 is uniquely exposed to the entire development life cycle – we partner with development teams to solve the biggest challenges in the area of software quality. This provides our engineers plenty of opportunities to grow and broaden their industry experience.Seriously, who wants to stay in one team repeating the same test cases for years? Instead you will write code that automate processes and you will engage developers to fix their quality problems. The role is highly technical, so we are looking for someone with strong analytical skills, basic Java and SQL knowledge for this internship.
title: Working Student - QA Automation Engineer
locations: Calea Floreasca 246 C, București, Municipiul București, România
